a.n: Au Coeur Des Parcs Naturels RÃ©gionaux De France

p.d: The Auvergne Volcanoes regional nature park Auvergne is comprised of five natural regions possessing distinctive identities and remarkable fauna and flora. This volcanic land is home to countless endemic species and owes its strong identity to an extensive rural society which has successfully preserved its know-how, products and culture. Directed by: Laurent Charbonnier (France, 2017)
